attractions.name: St. Michael and All Angels Church
attractions.description: A historic church built between 1888 and 1891, known for its stunning architecture and historical significance.

attractions.name: Mandala House
attractions.description: The oldest European building in Malawi, built in 1882. It now houses a library and art gallery.

attractions.name: Chichiri Museum
attractions.description: Also known as the Malawi Museum, it showcases the country's natural and cultural heritage.

attractions.name: La Caverna Art Gallery
attractions.description: A popular spot for art lovers, featuring a wide range of local and international art.

attractions.name: Jacaranda Cultural Center
attractions.description: A vibrant hub for cultural events, music, and art, promoting Malawian talent.

attractions.name: Blantyre Market
attractions.description: A bustling market where you can find everything from fresh produce to local crafts and textiles.

attractions.name: Michiru Mountain Conservation Area
attractions.description: A beautiful nature reserve perfect for hiking, bird watching, and enjoying panoramic views of the city.

attractions.name: Tiyamike Sewing Project
attractions.description: A community-based project that empowers local women through sewing and craft-making.
